question: Which of the following numbers: 7700, 3080, 5005, 3003: has two pairs of twin primes as their factors?
984x6y is a six-digit number, which is a multiple of 9, and x and y are non-zero digits. Find the minimum value of the product xy.
Alok wanted to type the first 200 natural numbers. How many times does he have to press the keys?
If  m is prime, then n is a composite number  and m + n = 240 also their LCM is 4199. Find m and n.

Three numbers p, q and r have the following properties:
  • The HCF of p and q is 24.
  • The LCM of p and q is 144.
  • The LCM of q and r is 73.
  • The HCF of p and r is 12.

Which of the following statements is true about the relationship between p, q and r?
